description:
Domon is about to face off against Cobra Gundam of Neo India. The pilot of Cobra Gundam has no qualms about hurting Domon before the match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Courage, Domon ! L’amitié est la clé de la victoire
Ganbare Domon! Tomo ni Sasageta Daishouri
Halte durch, Domon! Ein Triumph für das wiederhergestellte Vertrauen
Hang on, Domon! Triumph of the Restored Faith
頑張れドモン! 友に捧げた大勝利
